Air Force One.name: Air Force One
Air Force One.effect:
You can only buy this card if you destroyed a Jet this turn.
+4 Victory Points and all Units attack all Monsters in their boroughs.

Antimatter Pellets.name: Antimatter Pellets
Antimatter Pellets.effect:
Monsters you attack must roll a die.
Those that roll OUCH take double damage.

Artificial Heart.name: Artificial Heart
Artificial Heart.effect: You can change some or all of your HEART to ENERGY.

Broadway Star.name: Broadway Star
Broadway Star.effect: Gain 1 Victory Point when you take Superstar, and when you start your turn with it.

Brooklyn Bridge.name: Brooklyn Bridge
Brooklyn Bridge.effect:
Buy this card for 1 Energy Point less if you are in BROOKLYN.
+4 Victory Points.

Bullet Proof.name: Bullet Proof
Bullet Proof.effect: Whenever you take damage because of rolling OUCH, take 1 less damage.

Can Opener.name: Can Opener
Can Opener.effect: You only need 3 DESTRUCTION to destroy a Tank.

Carapace.name: Carapace
Carapace.effect:
Your Health Point maximum is increased by 2 as long as you have this card. For each OUCH you roll, place a Carapace token on this card.
You can discard this card to heal 1 damage for each Carapace token on it.

Central Park.name: Central Park
Central Park.effect:
Buy this card for 1 Energy Point less if you are in MANHATTAN.
+2 Victory Points and heal 2 damage.

Chameleon.name: Chameleon
Chameleon.effect:
You can discard as many VICTORY as you wish.
For each VICTORY discarded, you can change the face of one of the dice you haven't resolved.

Chinatown Regular.name: Chinatown Regular
Chinatown Regular.effect: Heal 2 damage when you enter MANHATTAN.

Climb the Empire State Building.name: Climb the Empire State Building
Climb the Empire State Building.effect: If you roll 1 of each dice type in MANHATTAN, gain 2 Victory Points and take another turn.

Columbia University.name: Columbia University
Columbia University.effect:
Buy this card for 1 Energy Point less if you are in MANHATTAN.
+2 Victory Points and take the next KEEP card revealed for free.

Coney Island.name: Coney Island
Coney Island.effect:
Buy this card for 1 Energy Point less if you are in BROOKLYN.
+3 Victory Points.

Curse.name: Curse
Curse.effect:
When you deal damage to Monsters, give each a Curse token. Each time a Monster wants to reroll OUCH, he must spend 1 Energy Point for each Curse token he has.
A Monster may use a HEART to discard a Curse token instead of using it to heal.

Diva.name: Diva
Diva.effect: The other monsters need 4 VICTORY to take Superstar from you.

Drain.name: Drain
Drain.effect: Take 2 Energy Points from Monsters that attack you.

Drink the Hudson.name: Drink the Hudson
Drink the Hudson.effect:
Buy this card for 1 Energy Point less if you are in MANHATTAN, BROOKLYN, or STATEN ISLAND.
+13 Energy Points, +1 Victory Point, and heal 2 damage.

Ego Trip.name: Ego Trip
Ego Trip.effect: Gain 1 Energy Point when you take Superstar and when you start your turn with it.

Fireball.name: Fireball
Fireball.effect: Your attacks also deal damage to the other Monsters in your borough.

Flatiron Building.name: Flatiron Building
Flatiron Building.effect:
Buy this card for 1 Energy Point less if you are in MANHATTAN.
+2 Victory Points.

Fury.name: Fury
Fury.effect: Add 1 DESTRUCTION and 1 Energy Point to your roll if you are in a borough with at least 3 Units.

General Ellis.name: General Ellis
General Ellis.effect:
You can only buy this card if you destroyed a Tank this turn.
+3 Victory Points and all Monsters take 1 damage.

Hailing Cabs.name: Hailing Cabs
Hailing Cabs.effect:
You may add 2 DESTRUCTION to your result.
If you do you can destroy only Units.

Holland Tunnel.name: Holland Tunnel
Holland Tunnel.effect:
Buy this card for 1 Energy Point less if you are in MANHATTAN.
+6 Victory Points and all Monsters gain 3 Energy Points.

Hunter.name: Hunter
Hunter.effect: Heal 1 damage each time you destroy an Infantry.

Jinx Aura.name: Jinx Aura
Jinx Aura.effect: Other Monsters must always use all their rerolls. (They still get to choose which dice to reroll.)

King of Queens.name: King of Queens
King of Queens.effect: Gain 1 Energy Point and heal 1 damage when you start your turn in Queens.

Leveler.name: Leveler
Leveler.effect: Gain 1 Victory Point each turn that you destroy at least one Building.

Long Neck.name: Long Neck
Long Neck.effect: You only need 2 DESTRUCTION to destroy a Jet.

Natural Selection.name: Natural Selection
Natural Selection.effect:
Gain 4 Energy Points and heal 4 damage when you buy this card.
You roll an extra die.
If you end your turn with at least 1 VICTORY, you lose this card, and all your Health Points.

New York Marathon.name: New York Marathon
New York Marathon.effect:
While this card is available for purchase, Monsters must pay 2 Energy Points to move (including fleeing from MANHATTAN), unless the movement is obligatory.
+2 Victory Points, +2 Energy Points, and heal 2 damage.

Next Stage.name: Next Stage
Next Stage.effect:
Lose all your Victory Points.
Gain 1 Energy Point or heal 1 damage for each Victory Point you lost this way.

Of Another World.name: Of Another World
Of Another World.effect: You can use Health Points as Energy Points and Energy Point as Health Points.

Overload.name: Overload
Overload.effect:
Gain 4 Energy Points when you buy this card.
Gain 1 Energy Point less when you roll any amount of ENERGY.

Painbow.name: Painbow
Painbow.effect:
If your results are...
-- 2 DESTRUCTION, you get an extra ATTACK.
-- 4 DESTRUCTION, you get an extra 2 ATTACK.
-- 6 DESTRUCTION, you win the game!

Personal Spotlight.name: Personal Spotlight
Personal Spotlight.effect: Gain 1 Victory Point each turn you rolled at least 1 VICTORY.

Phoenix Blood.name: Phoenix Blood
Phoenix Blood.effect: Gain 1 Energy Point each time you take damage.

Photo Op.name: Photo Op
Photo Op.effect: Choose a Monster. Gain 1 Victory Point for each damage you dealt to that Monster this turn.

Power Substation.name: Power Substation
Power Substation.effect: +1 Victory Point, +8 Energy Points and take 3 damage.

Power Tap.name: Power Tap
Power Tap.effect: Each time a Monster gains at least 3 Energy Points in a turn, that monster must pay you 1 Energy Point.

Regeneration.name: Regeneration
Regeneration.effect: Heal 1 damage at the start of your turn.

Scavenger.name: Scavenger
Scavenger.effect: You can buy KEEP cards from the discard by spending 1 Energy Point less than their cost.

Seismic Ray.name: Seismic Ray
Seismic Ray.effect: Spend 1 Energy Point to use your DESTRUCTION in any borough other than where you are.

Shadow Double.name: Shadow Double
Shadow Double.effect: Whenever you attack you deal double damage.

Sharp Shooter.name: Sharp Shooter
Sharp Shooter.effect:
You can destroy Jets that are not in your borough.
Gain 1 Victory Point each time you destroy a Jet.

Stink Attack.name: Stink Attack
Stink Attack.effect: Whenever you move, you may disperse up to four Units from your destination borough. Each dispersed Unit must move to a separate borough.

Subway.name: Subway
Subway.effect:
Heal 2 damage and take another turn.
During this extra turn, you can move as often as you like, whenever you like.

Super Speed.name: Super Speed
Super Speed.effect: You can have an extra move before rolling your dice.

Terminal Rage.name: Terminal Rage
Terminal Rage.effect:
Take another turn when you buy this card.
From now on you can no longer reroll ATTACK.

Tesla Antennae.name: Tesla Antennae
Tesla Antennae.effect: Monsters that have more Health Points than you take 1 extra damage whenever you attack them.

Tesla Cannon.name: Tesla Cannon
Tesla Cannon.effect:
+2 Victory Points.
All Monsters (including you) must discard one KEEP card.

The Unisphere.name: The Unisphere
The Unisphere.effect:
Buy this card for 1 Energy Point less if you are in QUEENS.
+4 Victory Points.

Tourist.name: Tourist
Tourist.effect: Place a Souvenir token in your current borough, and in each borough you enter that does not already have a Souvenir token. Gain 1 Victory Point and 1 Energy Point each time you place a Souvenir token.

Trash Thrower.name: Trash Thrower
Trash Thrower.effect: Monsters you attack lose 1 Victory Point.

Trophy Hunter.name: Trophy Hunter
Trophy Hunter.effect: Gain 1 Victory Point each time you destroy a Unit.

Universal Soldier.name: Universal Soldier
Universal Soldier.effect: You can change some or all of your HEART to ATTACK, and/or your ATTACK to HEART.

Violent Star.name: Violent Star
Violent Star.effect:
Deal 2 damage to the Monster from whom you take Superstar.
Deal 1 damage to the Monster who takes Superstar from you.

Webspinner.name: Webspinner
Webspinner.effect:
When you deal damage to Monsters, give them a Web token. A Monster has one fewer reroll on his turn for each Web token he has.
A Monster can choose to use an ATTACK to discard a Web token instead of using it to attack.

Yankee Stadium.name: Yankee Stadium
Yankee Stadium.effect:
Buy this card for 1 ENERGY less if you are in the BRONX.
+5 Victory Points and heal 5 damage.
